plot: Five ordinary college boys on a spring break road trip, with the hopes of meeting the girls of their dreams, miraculously encounter a gypsy who can give them a taste of their lustful desires.
title: Island of Fantasy
plot_es: Five ordinary college boys on a spring break road trip, with the hopes of meeting the girls of their dreams, miraculously encounter a gypsy who can give them a taste of their lustful desires.
plot_en: Five ordinary college boys on a spring break road trip, with the hopes of meeting the girls of their dreams, miraculously encounter a gypsy who can give them a taste of their lustful desires.
